description: Provide comprehensive and authoritative medical information by querying multiple trusted sources including FDA, WHO, PubMed, RxNorm, and Google Scholar. Enable detailed drug data retrieval, health statistics access, and medical literature search to support healthcare and research needs. Facilitate seamless integration with MCP-compatible clients for reliable medical data and research insights.

defaultCountryIso3.description: Default country ISO3 code for WHO queries (optional)

capabilities.name: search-drugs
capabilities.description: Search for drug information using FDA database

capabilities.name: pbs-get-latest-schedule
capabilities.description: Resolve the current latest PBS schedule_code for reuse by other calls.

capabilities.name: pbs-list-schedules
capabilities.description: List PBS schedules (optionally only the latest schedule)

capabilities.name: pbs-list-dispensing-rules
capabilities.description: List PBS dispensing rules optionally filtered by mnemonic/title/reference.

capabilities.name: pbs-get-restrictions-for-item
capabilities.description: Fetch restriction text (legal instrument + notes/cautions) for a PBS item code; auto-uses the item's schedule if not provided.

capabilities.name: pbs-get-prescribers-for-item
capabilities.description: List prescriber types allowed for a PBS item across schedules (e.g., Medical Practitioners).

capabilities.name: pbs-get-atc-for-item
capabilities.description: Return ATC classification(s) for a PBS item, enriched with ATC descriptions (de-duplicated).

capabilities.name: pbs-get-amt-mapping
capabilities.description: Return AMT concept mapping (MP/MPUU/MPP/TPP) for a PBS item (de-duplicated).

capabilities.name: pbs-get-organisation-for-item
capabilities.description: Return manufacturer/responsible person info for a PBS item (from /organisations).

capabilities.name: pbs-get-copayments
capabilities.description: Return PBS copayment amounts and Safety Net thresholds (latest by default).

capabilities.name: pbs-get-price-events-for-item
capabilities.description: Return statutory price reduction events for a PBS item (de-duplicated).

capabilities.name: pbs-get-program-details
capabilities.description: Return program info and dispensing rules for a PBS item (de-duplicated rules).

capabilities.name: pbs-get-item
capabilities.description: Fetch PBS item(s) by pbs_item_code and optional schedule_code; returns compact summary lines.

capabilities.name: pbs-search-item-overview
capabilities.description: Search PBS item-overview using simple ODATA-like filters (brand_name/li_drug_name/pbs_code, etc.).

capabilities.name: pbs-search
capabilities.description: Query Australia's PBS public API (rate-limited; ~20s between calls).

capabilities.name: pbs-summary-of-changes
capabilities.description: Summarize changes between schedules for a given endpoint/table (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE).

capabilities.name: list-who-indicators
capabilities.description: List WHO indicators by searching for a keyword (useful to find exact indicator names/codes)

capabilities.name: pbs-get-fees-for-item
capabilities.description: Fetch PBS fees by resolving an item's program_code, optionally for a specific schedule

capabilities.name: get-drug-details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific drug by NDC (National Drug Code)

capabilities.name: get-health-statistics
capabilities.description: Get health statistics and indicators from WHO Global Health Observatory

capabilities.name: search-medical-literature
capabilities.description: Search for medical research articles in PubMed

capabilities.name: search-drug-nomenclature
capabilities.description: Search for drug information using RxNorm (standardized drug nomenclature)

capabilities.name: search-google-scholar
capabilities.description: Search for academic research articles using Google Scholar
